backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with authorization and storage mixins and declares extensive ERP-related types for organizations, commerce, CRM, HRMS, and tasks.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a module containing duplicated ERP type definitions used for migration logic to maintain data compatibility.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists textual summaries of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and context providers.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH-driven color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router, global providers, authentication gating, and conditional modals for profile and Stripe setup.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Admin UI to add, edit, and delete product categories using a dialog-driven form.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin table for viewing orders and updating their status via a dropdown selector.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: UI for listing organizations and creating new ones with a form and dialog, using query hooks and optimistic creation logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Product CRUD interface with form dialog, category selection, and integration with product query/mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: Contact CRUD UI that loads contacts, supports add/edit/delete, and ties created records to the current Internet Identity user.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: Lead management interface enabling creation, editing, and deletion of leads, including stage handling and revenue fields.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Opportunity CRUD component allowing editing of value, probability, stage, and notes, linked to the authenticated user.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Renders a sales pipeline dashboard with stage counts, progress bars, and summary stats using pipeline and lead data queries.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding, GitHub link, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with auth controls, navigation, organization switcher, admin links, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Displays a placeholder card indicating attendance tracking features are coming soon.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: Provides CRUD management for departments with dialogs, forms, and table listings backed by department query hooks.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: Implements employee CRUD operations with forms, dialogs, and status handling, using HR dashboard and department queries.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: Shows pending leave requests with approve/reject actions and a table layout backed by leave management queries.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Displays a placeholder card for upcoming payroll processing functionality.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Shows a placeholder card for future employee performance tracking features.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Dropdown component that lets users view and switch between organizations from context.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to enter their name and submit a profile creation request.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for entering Stripe credentials and allowed countries to configure payments.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: Interface for listing, adding, and deleting user wallets with dialog-based creation.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Displays user's wallet balances and recent transactions, with auto-refresh and status indicators.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Defines a cart context storing items in localStorage with add, remove, update, and total calculation utilities.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Manages active organization state with persistence, mock organization fetching, and identity-dependent hydration.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Provides React context for managing wallet connectors, tracking availability, selection, connection state, and errors. Handles auto-selection, connection flow, and state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing access control and invalidating queries when identity changes. Returns the active actor and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing login, stored identities, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient. Loads identities on mount and exposes login and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, organizations, and ERP-related data using the backend actor. Some organization and ERP methods are placeholders awaiting backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports the wallet connector hook from the WalletConnectorContext.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base theme variables for light and dark modes, including color tokens and layout properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React Query and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying analytics, revenue, orders, and management components, with access control and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page handling item updates and checkout via Stripe or ICP with wallet integration.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: Admin-only CRM dashboard showing stats and management tabs for contacts, leads, opportunities, and pipeline.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: Admin-only HRMS dashboard providing overview metrics and management tabs for employees, departments, attendance, leaves, payroll, and performance.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays user's orders with status, details, and cancellation option, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to return to cart or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart and shows a success message with navigation to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Product catalog with search, category filtering, product listing, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Defines placeholder ERP domain types for products, orders, CRM, HR, and payroll until backend APIs are finalized.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Provides a helper to truncate long identity strings for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Implements the Oisy wallet connector, handling availability checks, connect/disconnect, and identity retrieval.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Implements the Plug wallet connector with connect flow, identity retrieval, and connection state checks.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Declares TypeScript types for in-page Plug and Oisy wallet providers on window.ic.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registers available wallet connectors and provides lookup utilities by connector ID.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Defines shared wallet connector interfaces, provider IDs, and identity info types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, versioning, feature inventory, and the current state of the UniversalERP system.
